archetype_name: Family Low-Fat Mediterranean Light Plates (15–30, Mild)
name: Lemony Cannellini & Leek Skillet with Roasted Zucchini over Brown & Wild Rice
description: Bright, low-fat Greek–Levant vibes: lemony cannellini and leeks over brown & wild rice with oregano-roasted zucchini and a crisp cucumber–mint side.
prep_steps: Heat oven to 220°C/425°F and line a baking tray.
Rinse 1.5 cups brown and wild rice under cold water.
Slice 1 large leek (white and light green parts) into thin half-moons; rinse grit away.
Chop 2 tablespoons parsley and 2 tablespoons mint.
Zest 1 lemon, then cut and squeeze for 3 tablespoons lemon juice.
Drain and rinse 2 cups cannellini beans.
cook_steps: Rice: In a pot, combine rinsed brown and wild rice with 3 cups vegetable stock. Bring to a boil, reduce to low, cover, and simmer until tender, 25–30 minutes. Keep covered off heat 5 minutes.
Roast veg: Toss zucchini and cherry tomatoes with 1 teaspoon olive oil, 1 teaspoon oregano, a pinch of salt, and black pepper. Spread on tray and roast 12–15 minutes until tender and lightly browned.
Bean skillet: Heat 1 teaspoon olive oil in a large nonstick pan over medium. Add leeks and a pinch of salt; cook 5–6 minutes until soft.
Stir in garlic; cook 30 seconds until fragrant.
Add cannellini beans, lemon zest, 1/2 cup vegetable stock, and a pinch of black pepper. Simmer 3–4 minutes to warm through and lightly thicken.
Finish beans with 2 tablespoons lemon juice and parsley. Taste and season with salt and black pepper as needed.
Cucumber side: In a bowl, combine cucumber, mint, 1 teaspoon olive oil, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, and 1/2 teaspoon sumac. Add a pinch of salt; toss.
Serve: Fluff rice and plate. Spoon lemony beans over rice, add roasted zucchini and tomatoes on the side, and serve cucumber–mint salad alongside.

Rice: In a pot, combine rinsed brown and wild rice with 3 cups vegetable stock. Bring to a boil, reduce to low, cover, and simmer until tender, 25–30 minutes. Keep covered off heat 5 minutes.
Roast veg: Toss zucchini and cherry tomatoes with 1 teaspoon olive oil, 1 teaspoon oregano, a pinch of salt, and black pepper. Spread on tray and roast 12–15 minutes until tender and lightly browned.

Add cannellini beans, lemon zest, 1/2 cup vegetable stock, and a pinch of black pepper. Simmer 3–4 minutes to warm through and lightly thicken.
Finish beans with 2 tablespoons lemon juice and parsley. Taste and season with salt and black pepper as needed.
Cucumber side: In a bowl, combine cucumber, mint, 1 teaspoon olive oil, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, and 1/2 teaspoon sumac. Add a pinch of salt; toss.
Serve: Fluff rice and plate. Spoon lemony beans over rice, add roasted zucchini and tomatoes on the side, and serve cucumber–mint salad alongside.

ingredients.preparation: divided (3 cups for rice, 1/2 cup for skillet)

final_ingredients.preparation: divided (3 cups for rice, 1/2 cup for skillet)
